name: Snow Bored
description: This is an early build for a 2d snowboarding game that I have started working on as a result of a Udemy class that I had purchased. I have finally got a working leaderboard and began trying to think of ways to improve upon this idea and make it unique, fun to play, and a great way to pass some time. Any and all feedback is greatly appreciated, both good and bad. I am an engineer during the day and an indie game developer at night.
